name: Only One Maki
description:
My submission for GMTK GameJam 2019.

A funny and crazy local multiplayer game about stealing the only maki remaining from your friend.

I hope you'll enjoy it <3

______________________________________________________________________________________

Developed by Angry Platypus Team:

- FrancoStanco (Gabriele Sciortino) - https://www.instagram.com/gabryollo/
